question:
Decrypt this Caesar cipher text: ADV TPUBALZ SHALY AOL THJOPUL KLWVZPALK OPT HSS KYLZZLK HA AOL AOYLZOVSK VM OPZ VMMPJL. Provide only the decrypted text as your final answer.
Output final answer with the format <<<answer>>>
response_list:
assistant > code_interpreter

def caesar_decrypt(ciphertext, shift):
    decrypted_text = ""
    for char in ciphertext:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_amount = 65 if char.isupper() else 97
            decrypted_text += chr((ord(char) - shift_amount - shift) % 26 + shift_amount)
        else:
            decrypted_text += char
    return decrypted_text

ciphertext = "ADV TPUBALZ SHALY AOL THJOPUL KLWVZPALK OPT HSS KYLZZLK HA AOL AOYLZOVSK VM OPZ VMMPJL."
shift = 7  # The shift for the Caesar cipher in this case
decrypted_text = caesar_decrypt(ciphertext, shift)
decrypted_text
assistant > <<<TWO MINUTES LATER THE MACHINE DEPOSITED HIM ALL DRESSED AT THE THRESHOLD OF HIS OFFICE.>>>
